item.title: Visualizing the State of the Amsterdam Housing Market
item.description: body { background-color: #EBEBEB; /* was #EFEFEF */ } table { font-family: "Nunito Sans", sans-serif; } code { background: #E0E0E0; } For this post, I decided to hide the code chunks by default to improve legibility. You can click the Show code-button to expand the code. Introduction I’m at the age where a lot of my peers start thinking about buying a home. It is a major conversation topic around the office, and these conversations are not often filled with optimism and excitement.
